title: Non-Abelian gauge theory on noncommutative spaces
abstract: We present a brief introduction to the construction of gauge theories on noncommutative spaces with star products. Particular emphasis is given to issues related to non-Abelian gauge groups and charge quantization. This talk is based on joined work with B. Jurco, J. Madore, L. Moeller, S. Schraml and J. Wess.
